Description: A straightforward adventure for a straightforward warrior.
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got two battle axes and all your equipment is|upgraded! Awesome! Also[;] you're extremely cursed!
Rules Description: Start with two upgraded [yellow]Battle Axes[].|[100%]All equipment you find is upgraded.|Inflicted with [curse]Curse[] at the start of every turn.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield+~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang+~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash+~[;]~Equipment:Pirate Hook+~|~Equipment:Midnight Charm+~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You seem pretty tough! Do you really need all that health?|Nah[;] you'll be fine without it.
Rules Description: Start with a [yellow]Venus Fly Trap[].|Lose [heart]2[] max hp when you level up.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Iron Shield~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Equipment:Last Stand~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: [100%]Enemies get 10% extra health.|[100%]All enemy equipment is upgraded.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Woah[;] everything's different!
Rules Description: [100%]Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Crescent Moon Blade~[;]~Equipment:Polar Star~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Battering Ram~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/warrior~)[;] ~init~)); leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2 # (getcurrentfloor() > 2 && descendingfromcontinue())) { var rewards = loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/warrior~); var rewards1 = getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards1~); var rewards2 = getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards2~); rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] ~Upgrade~]); }

Description: Business as usual: get in[;] rob a few enemies[;] defeat the|boss[;] get out.
Rules Description: Standard Rules.

Description: Get those pickpocketing fingers ready - this time[;] you're|stealing for keeps.
Rules Description: You can keep enemy equipment after each fight.

Description: On your first turn[;] all your dice roll 1. On your second[;]|they roll 2. Third time lucky? Nope[;] third time you roll a 3.
Rules Description: On your first turn[;] all dice rolls are 1.|Second turn[;] all dice rolls are 2.|... and so on.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Kunai~[;] ~Equipment:Hall of Mirrors~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Backstab~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Before Start Turn: var uptick = self.getvar(~uptick~); Rules.stackplayerdice([[uptick]][;] true); self.replaceskillcard(~Uptick@~ + uptick);
Script: End Turn: var uptick = self.getvar(~uptick~) + 1; if(uptick >=7) uptick = 1; self.setvar(~uptick~[;] uptick);
Script: After Combat: var uptick = self.getvar(~uptick~) + 1; if(uptick >=7) uptick = 1; self.setvar(~uptick~[;] uptick);

Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2 # (getcurrentfloor() > 2 && descendingfromcontinue())) { var rewards = loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/thief~);  var rewards1 = getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards1~); var rewards2 = getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards2~); rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] rewards2.pop()[;] ~Upgrade~]); }

Rules Description: Standard Rules.

Rules Description: Duplicate dice vanish immediately.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Ultima Weapon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Heat Sink~[;] ~Equipment:Increment~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);

Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spatula~[;]~Equipment:Doppeldice~]); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Ruby Weapon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:System Shock~[;]~Equipment:Flame War~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Chocolate Cookie~[;] ~Equipment:Mechanical Arm~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Dexterity Charm~[;]~Upgrade~]);

Script: Start Game: Rules.setalternate(~all~); Rules.enemyhpadjust = 1.1; var database = loaddata(~diceydungeons/jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills_rare~); Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~robot5~)); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true;

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/robot~)[;] ~init~)); leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);
Script: Start Game: Rules.remix = true;var database = loaddata(~diceydungeons/jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills_rare~); Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~robot6~)); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true;
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2 # (getcurrentfloor() > 2 && descendingfromcontinue())) { var rewards = loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/robot~); var rewards1 = getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards1~); var rewards2 = [rand(getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards2_sink~))]; rewards2.push(rand(getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards2_inc~))); rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] rewards2.pop()]); }

Description: Woah[;] everything's different!
Rules Description: [100%]Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] loadtext(~diceydungeons/jesterpacks/packs_paralleluniverse~)[;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Subdivide~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor?~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot?~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Subdivide~);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment(loadtext(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/jester~)); var subordupe = rand([~Equipment:Subdivide~[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~]);leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Boosterpack:Naughty Step[;]Time Out[;]Time Out~] [;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] subordupe); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior?~[;]rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch~])[;]rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor~])][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief?~[;] ~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief~])[;]rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot?~[;] ~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot~])[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] subordupe);

Description: Team up with the other contestants and recruit the dungeon's|monsters in one final effort to overthrow Lady Luck!
Rules Description: Recuit enemies you defeat in combat.|Switch between contestants and enemies by choosing cards from a deck.|Equipment doesn't recharge between turns.
